workflows.description: Sentieon long-read pipelines with minimap2, DNAscope and TNScope

workflows.description: PTCP pipeline for analyzing PacBio PureTarget carrier screening data

workflows.name: Secondary Analysis Utilities
workflows.description: Tasks for working with secondary analysis results and quality metrics. Includes compress and index functionality for VCF, BAM, CRAM, BED, and FASTQ files

workflows.name: Cohort Allele Frequency
workflows.description: Cohort population frequencies tracks computation from VCFs using gautil

workflows.description: Download tasks for Illumina BaseSpace for the Golden Helix Server

workflows.description: Integration workflow and tasks for Archer Analysis Server for Golden Helix Server

workflows.name: DNAnexus Integration
workflows.description: Golden Helix server tasks for automating file uploads and downloads with DNAnexus
